title: Then Jerico - First (The Sound Of Music), The Big Area, non-albu
description:
Then Jerico put out two of my favorite albums of the 80s.  They never hit it big in the US, which was a shame.  They're sort of somewhere between a-ha and Duran Duran.  Their name is spelled without the "h" but I added it for those who search for the wrong name.  I've also included a .txt file of lyrics most of the songs.  If you click on my name, you'll also see a torrent for some of their fanzines I found in pdf.


First (The Sound Of Music) - 1988  (Originally released in 1987 in the UK, this is the 1988 US version, which contains different mixes of some songs, along with three bonus tracks)

Let Her Fall    3:25   
Blessed Days 3:46   
Laughter Party     3:49   
Stable Boy     4:28   
The Motive (Living Without You)    5:48   
Muscle Deep    4:02   
Prairie Rose    5:07   
A Quiet Place (Apathy And Sympathy)     4:55   
Play Dead     4:39   
The Hitcher     6:07   

Let Her Fall (U.K. Mix)     3:26   
Prairie Rose (U.K. Extended)    6:24   
The Motive (Living Without You) (U.S. Extended)    5:55
